txt.en: Akûshu has asked you to find crunchy vegetables for the horses to snack on to relieve their distress. Crunchy vegetables can be found along the river-bank just south of Eshadûr.
You have given each horse at the stranded caravan a crunchy vegetable to snack upon. You should talk to Akûshu.
Akûshu is concerned about the horses' distress while the caravan is stranded.
'Wonderful! Look at how happy they all are now. It is good to meet someone else who loves horses. Thank you, [placeholder]!'

'I know that when I feel distressed I find myself wanting a snack. I recall seeing some crunchy vegetables along the river-bank just south of Eshadûr. Would you mind gathering some for the horses if you can find them? The vegetables, I mean. The horses are right here.'
'Would you mind gathering some crunchy vegetables for the horses?'
'You have the vegetables? Go ahead and give one to each horse.'
You have collected crunchy vegetables for the horses at the stranded caravan to snack upon. You should give one to each horse.
